Package com.example.carturestibackend.controllers

Class ReviewController

java.lang.Object
com.example.carturestibackend.controllers.ReviewController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/review") public class ReviewController extends Object
Controller class to handle HTTP requests related to reviews.

  • Method Details

    • getReviews

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ReviewDTO>> getReviews()
      Retrieves all reviews.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of ReviewDTO objects representing the reviews.

    • insert

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> insert(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ReviewDTO reviewDTO)
      Inserts a new review.
      Parameters:
      reviewDTO - The ReviewDTO object representing the review to insert.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the ID of the newly inserted review.

    • getReview

      @GetMapping("/{id_review}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReviewDTO> getReview(@PathVariable("id_review") long reviewID)
      Retrieves a review by its ID.
      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the ReviewDTO object representing the retrieved review.

    • deleteReview

      @DeleteMapping("/{id_review}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteReview(@PathVariable("id_review") long reviewID)
      Deletes a review by its ID.
      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review to delete.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity indicating the success of the operation.

    • updateReview

      @PutMapping("/{id_review}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ReviewDTO> updateReview(@PathVariable("id_review") long reviewID, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid ReviewDTO reviewDTO)
      Updates a review by its ID.
      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review to update.
      reviewDTO - The updated ReviewDTO object representing the new state of the review.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the updated ReviewDTO object.
